comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Is it "Carri"?  The 'r' and 's' seem to suggest this.  And Knigh, not Knight ?

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Agreed that 'Carrie' is most likely. She is a bit of a mystery this one...

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: I think perhaps the actress Carrie was appearing in the play "The Duchess of Dantzic"--see another Australian photographic appearance of the play here: handle.slv.vic.gov.au/10381/56842 Here's the wikipedia entry for the show: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Duchess_of_Dantzic

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02] Fabulous detective work! The records have all been updated with this info :)
